column3: Cases Pending Trial from the Previous Year (Col. 3)
column4: Cases Sent for Trial during the year (Col. 4)
column9: Cases Disposed off by Plea Bargaining (Col. 9)
column12: Cases Stayed or Sent to Record Room (Col. 12)
column13: Cases Convicted Out of Cases from Previous Year (Col. 13)
column14: Cases Convicted Out of Cases during the Year (Col. 14)
column18: Cases in which Trials were Completed (Col. 18) = (Col.15+Col.16+ Col.17)
column20: Cases Pending Trial at End of the Year (Col. 20) = (Col.5 - Col.19)
